channel.title: GitHub Trending - TypeScript (Weekly)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in TypeScript nel periodo weekly

item.title: 🟦 dahlia/upyo (117 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: dahlia

📝 Repository: dahlia/upyo

📄 Descrizione: Upyo is a simple and cross-runtime library for sending email messages using SMTP and various email providers. It works on Node.js, Deno, Bun, and edge functions.

⭐ Stelle: 117

🍴 Forks: 1

💻 Linguaggio: TypeScript

🏷️ Topics: bun deno email javascript mail mailgun nodejs sendgrid sendmail smtp typescript

📜 Licenza: No license

⏰ Creato il: 2025-07-11T04:36:38Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-07-15T02:59:05Z

Visita il Repository su GitHub

]]>
